data.actual_result: The 'Allow Discord access...' message appears in the middle of the screen pointing to the top
data.expected_result: The 'Allow Discord access...' message should appear and point to the bar at the bottom
data.short_description: [Edge] Microphone permission message is incorrectly placed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Edge and go to Settings -> Advanced Settings - Click Manage under Website Permissions and remove any existing entries for Discord - Open the Discord webapp and sign in/create an account - Click the Mute button next to your username
